channel.title: Matter for Ramanathan Kathiresan
channel.itunes:author: Matter
channel.itunes:summary: These are the audio versions of stories saved in your Matter queue.

item.title: Money Stuff: Elon Musk’s Work on Twitter’s Board Is Done
item.description: The Board and I had many discussions about Elon joining the board, and with Elon directly. We were excited to collaborate and clear about the risks.
item.content:encoded: The Board and I had many discussions about Elon joining the board, and with Elon directly. We were excited to collaborate and clear about the risks.

item.itunes:summary: The Board and I had many discussions about Elon joining the board, and with Elon directly. We were excited to collaborate and clear about the risks.

item.title: An Interview with Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang about Manufacturing Intelligence (Stratechery Interview 3-28-2022)
item.description: The full interview with Huang is below. This interview has been lightly edited for clarity, and is also available as a podcast; to listen in your podcast player sign-up for a Stratechery account and add your personal podcast feed.
item.content:encoded: The full interview with Huang is below. This interview has been lightly edited for clarity, and is also available as a podcast; to listen in your podcast player sign-up for a Stratechery account and add your personal podcast feed.

item.title: Tech and War
item.description: While it has been only 11 days since Russia invaded Ukraine, it is already clear that the long-term impact on the tech industry is going to be substantial.
item.content:encoded: While it has been only 11 days since Russia invaded Ukraine, it is already clear that the long-term impact on the tech industry is going to be substantial.
item.itunes:author: Matter
item.itunes:summary: While it has been only 11 days since Russia invaded Ukraine, it is already clear that the long-term impact on the tech industry is going to be substantial.

item.title: Cloudflare acquires ‘modern’ CASB, aims to become most-deployed SASE
item.description: Cloudflare surveyed the CASB market broadly as it investigated whether to partner with a vendor, acquire a vendor, or internally develop capabilities to bring CASB functionality to its SASE platform, he said.
item.content:encoded: Cloudflare surveyed the CASB market broadly as it investigated whether to partner with a vendor, acquire a vendor, or internally develop capabilities to bring CASB functionality to its SASE platform, he said.
